website_summaries.verdict: Large, self-contained and holds 400 crushed cans.
pros: Keeps your cans hidden away in the container after crushing
Great for game rooms or other high-traffic areas
cons: Manual operation on this can crusher

customer_reviews.title: Space saver and maneuverable
customer_reviews.text: I have this product for my can recyclables. 33 gallon large capacity, easy to use, easy to move. Not like a wall mounted crusher. A wall mounted crusher is capable of crushing larger cans, where this is not, but a wall mounted crusher is stationary, no option to move. My work place has had this type of crusher 10 years with no issues This helped with my decision to purchase. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: NMartin

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Bought This
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy beer. What I don't enjoy is that the cans tend to pile up a bit after time. Now, I have a trash can for trash and another trash can for dead beer cans that easily compacts them. This isn't about recycling or climate change or anything like that -- this is about my man-cave. I'm building a home recording studio, and beer and wine flow quite freely during sessions, which leaves a big mess. This compactor makes the clean-up so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Senor Quicksdraw

customer_reviews.title: Easy closed system/ sturdy. Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home not a business. I am very impressed. Didn’t want a wall mounted can crusher. So tired of the pop drippings everywhere. This is one closed system, 2 parts; the lid and bin. Bin is very sturdy. Place pop can on side, pull handle down, and the crushed can slides into bin. This was so worth it! Takes a second to get the perfect technique but so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Efficiently crushes cans and the bin is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. It takes a few tries to figure out how to fully crush the cans but well built. Make sure you put it somewhere that protects it from rain or it will fill with water. Excellent for pool side with heavy drinkers!!!
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER M.

customer_reviews.title: Efficient way to recycle
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! It takes a little work for the extra large and small skinny cans, but is totally doable. It came before I expected it! The guys at the shop are happy that they don’t have to empty the recycling bin as often.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee Vossler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic! Large capacity is so nice easy to use and stores them all in one! So happy with this can crusher
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Cans stick and must be further crushed by hand to fit into the slot. Bottles bend so they also must be further compacting manually. It's complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Weil

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when we first received this trash can crusher. The can crusher on the lid is made of plastic and not the heavy duty metal can crusher. However, it works great with just a little bit of practice (maybe 5 cans). You push the handle down to crush the can and as you fold the handle back, there is another piece of the handle that pushes the crushed can into the opening in the lid. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: fits in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: this is a little taller than my 13 gallon trash bin. it fits nicely in a corner. I put a 33 gallon bag to keep moving cans easy. it holds a lot of cans! flattening mechanism is very sturdy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I am a life skills teacher. I first bought one of these as a housekeeping chore activity at school. I bought a second for home, since my family goes through many canned beverages. It is easy to use and I love that the cans are bagged, compact, and ready to be recycled.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more clutter!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is the color. Not very attractive. Otherwise it is a good investment! Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: HPS

customer_reviews.title: Works great for can recycle.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Takes some strength to crush cans, but once you figure it out it works just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Since 1998
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a second recycler for my youth group and I ran into this on Amazon to give a comment about this can crusher, I did not buy my first one on Amazon but I have had it since 1998. Other than normal wear and tear the crusher part on top is still in good shape. Still ejects the cans into the receptacle like day one. Just keep it clean. Cleans very easy, trash bags fit very well to pull out.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Morse

product_meta.title: Commercial Zone Canpactor Recycling Container 30 gal.- Beige .
